about_the_game:
"

D&D Player's Handbook - Syrinscape Sound Link Pack

Syrinscape Sound Link Packs for Fantasy Grounds work with your Syrinscape Super Syrin subscription to provide you context-specific sounds for weapon attacks, casting of spells, and damage types for content in the D&D Player's Handbook.  The collection of Sound Sets can be created for free within the Fantasy Grounds Unity sound interface, but this pack has done all the work for you to link the content. Appropriate sounds from Syrinscape will trigger automatically based on attacks (hit, miss, critical success, critical failure), damage dealt, or the spell being cast. This pack include 512 sounds sets, separated into the following categories:
  • Attack/Item Triggers (crossbow, longsword, club, etc.)
  • Damage Triggers (acid, cold, fire, force, psychic, radiant, necrotic, thunder, slashing, etc)
  • Death Triggers
  • Spells
for NPCs in the D&D Monster Manual that match the monster or NPC name to a set of sounds in Syrinscape. Sounds will include links to moods, music, elements, and oneshots. These sound sets contain links to Syrinscape sounds only and this pack does not grant you access to any sounds you don't already own at Syrinscape. For the best experience, we recommend subscribing to the Super Syring subscription at Syrinscape to enable access to all sounds. "
detailed_description:
"

D&D Player's Handbook - Syrinscape Sound Link Pack

Syrinscape Sound Link Packs for Fantasy Grounds work with your Syrinscape Super Syrin subscription to provide you context-specific sounds for weapon attacks, casting of spells, and damage types for content in the D&D Player's Handbook.  The collection of Sound Sets can be created for free within the Fantasy Grounds Unity sound interface, but this pack has done all the work for you to link the content. Appropriate sounds from Syrinscape will trigger automatically based on attacks (hit, miss, critical success, critical failure), damage dealt, or the spell being cast. This pack include 512 sounds sets, separated into the following categories:
  • Attack/Item Triggers (crossbow, longsword, club, etc.)
  • Damage Triggers (acid, cold, fire, force, psychic, radiant, necrotic, thunder, slashing, etc)
  • Death Triggers
  • Spells
for NPCs in the D&D Monster Manual that match the monster or NPC name to a set of sounds in Syrinscape. Sounds will include links to moods, music, elements, and oneshots. These sound sets contain links to Syrinscape sounds only and this pack does not grant you access to any sounds you don't already own at Syrinscape. For the best experience, we recommend subscribing to the Super Syring subscription at Syrinscape to enable access to all sounds. "

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
